content: Loans Investments Asked by 天明Asked on 01 Oct 2018SeedIN ?Anyone invested in SeedIN which is a P2P investment like FS2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 02 Oct 2018Heard of them through Facebook, they are regulated by MAS and have funded many loans. Based on their statistics, they have 0% default rate. Sounds pretty impressive, but still proceed with caution and diversify your investments. Don't invest too much at one go for a start or into a single loan. https://sg.seedin.tech/statistics0 comments0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 01 Oct 2018First time heard about this.  Never touch this before but recommend to find some more establish and reliable one with good track records.​Read Seedly comparison and actual user of the establish platform review: https://blog.seedly.sg/p2p-comparison/​0 comments0
